document.full_text: the surge of hot money that has vexed many emerging markets may slow dramatically once the u.s. federal reserve begins raising interest rates, the international monetary fund said on thursday.
document.title: imf: "fickle" capital flows may slow when fed hikes
lines_and_colors: the surge of hot money that has vexed many emerging markets may slow dramatically once the u.s. federal reserve begins raising interest rates, the international monetary fund said on thursday.
